snippet: The fate of Ophadell Williams, the bus driver accused of causing the deaths of 15 people in the Bronx last year, will be learned Friday morning.
abstract: Bronx jury says it has reached a verdict in manslaughter case of bus driver Ophadell Williams, accused of being so deprived of sleep that he caused crash that killed 15 passengers and injured many more; verdict is to be revealed following morning to give sufficient time to address all 54 charges against Williams.
lead_paragraph: The fate of Ophadell Williams, the bus driver accused of causing the deaths of 15 people in the Bronx last year, will be learned Friday morning.

headline.seo: Verdict on Fatal Casino Bus Crash to Be Read on Friday
headline.main: Verdict Reached in Fatal Bus Crash Case
headline.print_headline: Verdict Reached in Fatal Bus Crash Case
